text:
Dear Chetak Customer Support,



I am writing this email with extreme anger and frustration. I purchased your so-called Chetak Premium Model electric scooter just one year ago, paying a hefty ‚Çπ1,50,000 for what I was led to believe was a premium vehicle. Within one month, I started facing repeated issues, and now, within a year, the battery is completely dead.



Your product has not only wasted my money, but cost me my job due to its unreliability. I depended on this scooter for my daily commute, and thanks to your pathetic quality and irresponsible service, I‚Äôve been left stranded multiple times.

author: @prateeek12

text:
Hi all,

I have brought a simple one electric scooter last week. I just want to share my experience here about this. Visited showroom on Saturday and taken a test drive for 3kms and decided to purchase it after the explanation by the staff. Requested for immediate delivery and got it on Sunday. I have to travel 100kms (Up and down)a day to office. With 40% of battery consumption reaching to office in 70 minutes, drive in Ride mode max. Speed 69kmph. After reaching home left with 20% battery üîã.  But returning little bit late to home. Approx 100 minutes. 
I'm happy with the build quality and riding experience. Yesterday registration also done. Total experience with SIMPLE ONE is simply superb. Don't understand why it's not in best selling ev scooter.

author: @Nabendu-d2h

text: Cost effective, underrated scooter complying with  practicality attributes required from a scooter.  Early days.  I have purchased one on March8th and till date covered 2800km. No mercy shown since it is used for commercial applications. Our Roads not always smooth and have  regular gradients. Range is defnitely 85km  in low mode. But what is surprising is that with  timely, proper use of high mode the scooter has good ability to  overcome flyover or other geographical gradients  even with 2persons  and tool kit cumulatively weighing 150kgs. Only Con is charging time.  Another underrated feature is LFP battery. More charging cycles than NMC battery .
